metadata.title: CVE-2018-15160 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libesedb_catalog_definition_read function inlibesedb_catalog_definition.c in libesedb through 2018-04-01 allows remoteattackers to cause a heap-based buffer over-read via a crafted esedb file.NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in the GitHub issuecomments.

criterions.comment: libesedb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
